Title: How to use GitHub Copilot with OpenCode
Description:
GitHub Copilot now supports OpenCode, the open-source agent for your terminal and desktop. Whether you have a Pro, Business, or Enterprise subscription, you can bring your existing plan to this powerful tool. In this short, we show you exactly how to connect your credentials.

#GitHubCopilot #OpenCode #GitHub
